translation: Good afternoon, everyone!
transcript: 诶大家下午好！

translation: I'm very glad to have this opportunity to introduce Baidu's current voice technology to you.
transcript: 非常高兴有这个机会跟大家聊一聊额百度目前的额语音技术。

translation: In fact, the voice technology is a highly focused technology.
transcript: 其实语音技术是一个非常专注的技术，

translation: We focus on two aspects only.
transcript: 我们只专注于两个方面。

translation: The first aspect is to recognize the sounds of all things.
transcript: 第一个方面是我们讲的要识别声音。

translation: The second aspect is to synthesize sounds, and our objective is to synthesize the sounds of all things if possible.
transcript: 可以说是识别万物的声音，另外一方面就是合成声音。

translation: However, 99% of our work is to recognize and synthesize human voices.
transcript: 有可能的话我们的梦想当然是合成万物的声音，但实际上现在我们百分之九十九的工作都在识别人类的声音和合成人类的声音。

translation: So, I'd like to talk about some achievements recently made by Baidu in the voice technology.
transcript: 所以给大家介绍一下百度最近在这个语音额技术方面的一些进展。

translation: I think that Baidu attaches the greatest importance to the voice technology among all the Internet companies.
transcript: 额百度应该是额所有的互联网公司里面我认为最重视语音技术的公司。

translation: We have been constantly and resolutely investing in the voice technology for many years, and we apply every breakthrough technology to our products promptly.
transcript: 我们从额非常早的时间就持续不断地、非常坚决地对语音技术进行投入，而且只要我们的技术有了突破，就马上把它放到各个产品上。

translation: So, if you use Baidu's products, you can find that almost all of them provide excellent voice-recognition experience.
transcript: 所以额如果大家使用百度的一些产品的话，你会发现几乎每个产品额都有很好的语音体验的功能。

translation: Here are some of these products, and I highly recommend our Baidu App.
transcript: 额这里面额列了这这样一些产品吧，我这边强力推荐的就是我们的手百。

translation: The voice search experience on Baidu App is really amazing.
transcript: 我们手百上的这个语音搜索体验啊真的是非常的好。

translation: When using it, you can just press the microphone button and speak instead of typing with your fingers.
transcript: 额你们要是有机会额一定不要用这个手这个手指再打打字了，直接按着上面那个麦克。

translation: Now, our voice recognition is highly accurate.
transcript: 然后说说就是说任何的话，我们现在识别应该是非常的准。

translation: We have been constantly investing in this technology, and made new breakthroughs in the voice technology almost every year.
transcript: 额正因为我们在这技术上一直坚持不断地投入，实际上额我们基本上是以每年为单位，在语音技术上都有这样的突破。

translation: As you can see, in 2012, we became the first one to apply the deep learning technology and the DNN technology to products among the Internet companies in China.
transcript: 大家看从这个2012年我们是额国内的互联网公司里面第一家把深度学习技术把这DNN的技术在工程应用上应用到我们的产品上的这样的一个团队。

translation: We all know that the deep learning technology was first developed in 2010 and 2011.
transcript: 大家都知道深度学习起来的时候基本上是在额10年、11年这个样子。

translation: But breakthroughs lied mainly in academic conferences and public test sets.
transcript: 但那个时候大部分还都是在这个额学术会议上，还有在这个额公开的测试集上取得的一些突破。

translation: In 2012, we fully migrated the deep learning technology to our product line.
transcript: 但是我们在2012年就已经把这个深度学习技术完整地搬到了我们这个线上。

translation: We completely engineered it.
transcript: 额我们把它完整的工程化。

translation: In fact, if you have ever involved in the project, you should know that the accuracy improvement of a public or private test set is greatly different from that of a high-traffic product line.
transcript: 就是是实际上大家做这个工程的应该都知道，就是你在公开的测试集上或者你私有的测试集上取得的这个进这个这个准确度的提升和你在实际线上能够应付非常高的海海量的这个流量上面，这个准确度的提升这个是非常不一样的。

translation: For example, if you try the voice search function on Baidu App now, you can find that the result is displayed quickly on the screen.
transcript: 额举个例子，就是我们现在的手百的语音搜索，如果你去体验的话额你会发现它的上屏的速度非常的快。

translation: That is, the characters are displayed on the screen as soon as your voice comes out.
transcript: 就是说只要你的声音一出来我们马上就会有字上屏。

translation: We have done a large amount of work to achieve such top-level user experience by shortening the system response time to 100 milliseconds, 50 milliseconds and even 20 milliseconds.
transcript: 这里面我们做了非常非常多的工作，基本上就是100毫秒、50毫秒、20毫秒这么一点一点地抠，才能有这样极致的用户的体验，所以这个我们做了非常多的工作。

translation: We have also made improvements on the models every year.
transcript: 然后呢，上面基本上每一年吧都有这个额模型上面的一些提升。

translation: I will not talk about them one by one.
transcript: 我们不一一的说了。

translation: Later, I will talk about our recent advances in the acoustic models.
transcript: 额一会儿的话给大家介绍一下我们最近的在我们声学模型上的一些额进步。

translation: Our current main breakthroughs are almost concentrated on the so-called end-to-end voice recognition model.
transcript: 额，我们现在的比较好的突破，基本上还都是集中在所谓的端到端的这个额语音识别的这个模型上。

translation: Unlike the end-to-end model, the conventional voice recognition model includes the acoustic model and the language model.
transcript: 和端到端额不太一样的是，以前传统的这个语音识别它基本上是分得比较细，先是这个声学模型，然后语言模型。

translation: The speeches are converted into texts via a decoder after being processed by AM and LM in sequence.
transcript: 然后额两边的话再同进入一个解码器，最后呢出这个文字。

translation: However, we have experimented with the end-to-end model for a long time.
transcript: 但是端到端的呃这个模型的实验我们也做了很久。

translation: At the beginning, our idea was to catch the sound waves and convert them directly into Chinese characters by our deep learning model.
transcript: 在最一开始的时候，额我们的这个想法是把声波进来，然后呢额通过我们的深度学习的模型我们希望直接出的就是汉字。

translation: This was a complete end-to-end model, but we met challenges on it.
transcript: 这样的话是一个比较完整的端到端的模型，但这个在这个模型上我们也碰到了一些困难。

translation: Although we achieved a higher accuracy rate on some test sets compared to the previous models, we encountered two challenges.
transcript: 虽然我们在一些很好的这个测试集上取得了比以前的额这个模型很好的这个准确率的提升，但是我们碰到两个困难。

translation: One is to recognize speeches mixed with English and Chinese.
transcript: 一个是中英文识别。

translation: Nowadays when we speak, many of us are used to speaking Chinese with some English words, right?
transcript: 因为咱们现在大部分人说说话的话，很多时候都会夹杂着这个英文是吧？

translation: For example, many expressions like "When will this ‘iPhone’ be available on the market?", "Where does ‘Angelababy’ shoot recently?" and “Songs of ‘TFboys’” have combined both Chinese and English words, which brings new challenges to the voice recognition technology.
transcript: 比如ii这个iPhone什么时候上啊？这个Angelababy最近在哪儿演戏呀？然后TFboys的歌啊什么的，很多中英文合在一起，这样的话会对这个技术带来挑战。

translation: The other one is to recognize new words.
transcript: 另外一个就是生生词。

translation: For the deep learning model, once the output terminal is fixed, it cannot be changed or updated dynamically.
transcript: 因为额这个深度学习的模型它的一个输出的头如果你一旦把它固固这个固定了，它就已经是固定的，它不能动态地去变化。

translation: We used four to five thousand Chinese characters, but still failed to include the newly created Chinese characters.
transcript: 所以我们当时额用了四五千个汉字，但是呢没有办法去囊括这个新生成的这样的汉字。

translation: So we made many technological explorations to solve this problem.
transcript: 所以后面我们又进行了一系列的这个技术的探索吧。

translation: So far, we have made a new breakthrough in the end-to-end technology.
transcript: 到了今天我们端到端的技术又取得了一个新的突破。

translation: I briefly presented it at Baidu World Conference.
transcript: 这个突破我在额我们百度世界大会上也稍微地介绍了一下。

translation: We changed the modeling unit from previous Chinese character unit to the current high-frequency phoneme unit.
transcript: 就是我们现在把我们建模单元从以前的这个汉字的单元又变成了这个我们叫高频音素的单元。

translation: As a result, our modeling ability was greatly improved.
transcript: 这样的话我们的建模能力比以前又有了很大的提提升。

translation: We also overcame another problem. That is, if the modeling unit is small, it may easily cause over-fitting during training.
transcript: 而且我们还克服了,这个当你建模单元比较小的时候这个训练的时候容易过拟合的问题。

translation: By using the phoneme modeling method, we have made great breakthroughs in voice recognition for Chinese or English speeches, natural utterances and randomly long speeches.
transcript: 所以我们现在用纯音素的建模的方式，我们在额中英文上，我们在这个自然语流的说话，就是你大大时间就是这个很长时间随意地说说话这个识别上都取得了一些比较好的突破。

translation: We will continuously optimize this end-to-end model, and we believe that it is a favorable trend of developing the voice recognition technology in the future.
transcript: 所以这个端到端的模型我们后续会持续地把它优化下去，我们认为这一定是就是语音识别在后面一段时间比较好的一个技术方向。

translation: So far, many competitors claim that their voice recognition rate is 97% or 98%.
transcript: 所以，额做到现在的话，大家也会看到就是很多竞品也在说我们的识别率是97%，我们的识别率是98%。

translation: In fact, this is for the near-field voice.
transcript: 实际上额这个大的环境下都是针对所谓的近场语音。

translation: The so-called near-field voice is just like how I speak right now.
transcript: 所谓的近场语音就是我现在的说话的这个模式。

translation: The distance between the sound source and the receiver is less than one meter, and my voice is clear.
transcript: 就是这个声源额离这个收音的这个设备在小于一米的范围之内，而且呢说话是比较清晰的。

translation: This is called the near-field voice.
transcript: 我们管这个叫近场的语音。

translation: The near-field voice technology has been optimized after constant technological breakthroughs in recent years.
transcript: 在近场的语音上，额经过这几年技术上不断地突破，已经做得非常的完完整和完善。

translation: Here are some applications of the near-field speech recognition.
transcript: 这里面给大家列了一些近场语音上面额的一些应用。

translation: I won't elaborate.
transcript: 额这边就不一一个一个的细的跟大家说了。

translation: You can try the voice recognition on our Baidu App, Baidu Map, and TalkType.
transcript: 就是额大家也可以试试我们额这个通过不论是手手百也好，地图也好，还是我们语音的输入法也好，下面的语音应用。

translation: When you whisper, your voice will be accurately recognized even if your vocal cords do not vibrate.
transcript: 就是你在小声轻声说话的时候，就是你的这个声音，你的这个声带没有震动的时候你去跟它喷那个字，它也会非常好地给你识别出来。

translation: This model is highly robust for the near-field voice.
transcript: 就是这个模型的鲁棒性已经非常好，对于近场来讲。

translation: Therefore, we think the near-field speech recognition is sophisticated and advanced with high accuracy, although there are many different opinions on its accuracy and recognition rate.
transcript: 所以我们认为额虽然外面有很多的PR这个准确率、识别率是什是什么样的，但对于近场语音技术来讲，已经基本上是一个比较成熟的状态，就是它的技术高度已经非常的高了，它的准确率也已经非常的准了。

translation: The sole thing we need to do is to make horizontal applications based on the accurate near-field voice recognition.
transcript: 额唯一我们需要做的就是在近场语音这个非常准的技技术的基础上做很多的横向的应用。

translation: Horizontal applications are our most important objective. They involve recognition of dialects, Chinese, English and other minority languages worldwide, as well as conferences and speeches.
transcript: 譬如说方言的识别,中英文的识别,额国际化各种各种特殊语种的识别,然后会议的识别,什么说话人的识别，各种各样横向的应用才是最重要的。

translation: At this point, creativity and intelligence of our developers are strongly appreciated.
transcript: 所以这个时候，实际上额真的是非常需要我们的开发者们去发挥你们的聪明才智。

translation: So far, the near-field voice technology is quite satisfactory, and we expect that it can be widely applied in different Apps.
transcript: 因为对于近场的语音技术来讲，我们觉得做到目前，额我们已经属于比较满意的状态，唯一想看到的就是它在应用上去大规模地去推广。

translation: I want to talk a bit more about this.
transcript: 这一块儿再多说一点。

translation: So far, what degree has our near-field voice technology reached?
transcript: 就是近场语音到了一个什么样的程程度呢？

translation: For example, we randomly pick some voice search queries from Baidu App.
transcript: 就是额我们把手百上的语音搜索的这个query把它额拿下来一个批次。

translation: The users are of different age groups and from different regions, so they have different accents.
transcript: 因为它是有不同的年龄段和不同的这个地域带有不同的口口这个口音。

translation: We  randomly pick 50 queries and have some people and our online models listen to it.
transcript: 又随机地找出50个这样的query，然后去让人来听，还有让这个我们的这个线上的模型去听。

translation: If you randomly ask a person to compete with our online model, this person probably will fail.
transcript: 如果你随机地抽一个人和我们线上模型比的话，你基本上是额不会被额就我们的模型基本上会PK掉你。

translation: Our model would only fail if more than 20 people cooperated to challenge it.
transcript: 唯一没有PK掉的时候就是大20多个人一起商量。说这个哎，这个听这个话到底是什么意思。

translation: Under this circumstance, there is a chance that the model would fail.
transcript: 这个这个时候有的时候能够PK掉线上的模型。

translation: The accuracy rate is high for near-field voice recognition, and it shows the current status of the technology.
transcript: 就是近场的语音，额这个识别现在就这么准，这个是它现在的技术现技术的现状。

translation: Now let's take a look at some of our queries online.
transcript: 现在给大家稍微额看一下我们现在线线上的一些query。

translation: Let's listen.
transcript: 大家也就听听一听一随便听一下。

translation: "Boonie Bears".
transcript: 熊出没。

translation: The online query comes from the search engine.
transcript: 就是就是因为线上的话我们的query都是搜索的嘛。

translation: So, it is a direct statement, and does not contain any context.
transcript: 就大家都是那么直接说说一句话，没有上文也没有下文。

translation: A single word or phrase suddenly comes out.
transcript: 就突然间就这么一句话。

translation: Actually, this is a quite difficult scenario for context-based voice recognition.
transcript: 实际上这是一个额相对于上下文关联的来讲是一个比较难的语音识别的问题。

translation: "Boonie Bears".
transcript: 熊出没。

translation: I wonder what you hear from this.
transcript: 也不知道大家听到是什么意思。

translation: "Boonie Bears".
transcript: 熊出没。

translation: Look.
transcript: 看。

translation: This is a little kid searching for the cartoon.
transcript: 它是小孩子找那个动画动画片儿。

translation: Let's listen to another one.
transcript: 再听一个。

translation: "Boonie Bears".
transcript: 熊出没。

translation: Now it sounds like what it is.
transcript: 你现在听就肯定听的比较有像的。

translation: However, if I play it to you suddenly, you may fail to understand it.
transcript: 但是如果猛的一句拿给你听，你还真不一定能听懂它是什么意思。

translation: "How to make Braised Dongpo Pork?"
transcript: 东坡肉怎么做？

translation: I have heard that one of our audience already recognized it.
transcript: 你看我我听到有的那个我们我们的那个听众里面把它听准了。

translation: "How to make Braised Dongpo Pork?"
transcript: 东坡肉怎么做？

translation: "How to make Braised Dongpo Pork?"
transcript: 东坡肉怎么做？

translation: Such queries fall into many different categories.
transcript: 这个它的query是额分成各种各样不同的。

translation: For example, we find that most children are searching for their expected cartoons.
transcript: 比如说我们看到孩子的，大部分都是搜他想要的就是动画片的资源。

translation: "A lot of Ultramen."
transcript: 好多奥特曼。

translation: It's hard for ordinary people to recognize what a kid shouts suddenly.
transcript: 这小孩儿喊一嗓子其实对于我们普通人来讲还是挺难的。

translation: "A lot of Ultramen."
transcript: 好多奥特曼。

translation: "A lot of Ultramen."
transcript: 好多奥特曼。

translation: I assume that we may still fail to recognize what it is even if we replay it several times.
transcript: 我估计再放几遍可能也就也不太好听。

translation: So this voice recognition technology is highly robust for the near-field voice.
transcript: 所以这个语音技术来讲就是它的鲁棒性已经非常强，对于现对于这种近场的语音来。

translation: "A lot of Ultramen."
transcript: 好多奥特曼。

translation: We can understand it when listening to it at this time.
transcript: 这回听可以啦。

translation: So we are highly willing to get such a voice technology available on ai.baidu.com.
transcript: 所以这里面就是在语音这个技术存在这样的一个状态的话，我们是非常愿意把它去开放的，就是这里面我们语音技术也在这个ai.baidu.com上也会进一步的去开放。

translation: There are mainly three aspects: recognition, synthesis, and wake-up.
transcript: 大概就是三个方面：一个是识别，一个是合成，一个是唤醒。

translation: Later, I will focus on our wake-up technology, because we have the faith that our voice technology could help people "wake up everything", and enable all devices to use our wake-up words.
transcript: 一会儿的话会跟大家再着重地介绍一下我们的唤醒技术，因为额我们有一个理念就叫做我们希望我们的语音技术能够帮助大家叫“唤醒万物”，就是让所有的设备都能够额使用我们的唤醒词。

translation: Our Baidu is called "Xiaodu".
transcript: 我们百度叫“小度小度”。

translation: We can simply wake it, and then talk to it.
transcript: 额说一声嗯，然后呢就能够通过语音的方式跟它进行去对话。

translation: We knew that this technology was important when we get involved with it.
transcript: 这个这个技术额就是我们在做的时候知道它重要。

translation: Later, we further discovered that among the three aspects including recognition, synthesis and wake-up, the most difficult technology is wake-up, and we hold the same view even inside Baidu.
transcript: 但是做到现在我们才知道这个是，额我们现在这三这三代里面，识别、合成和唤醒，最难的技术是唤醒，就是哪怕在百度的话我们也这样认这个认为。

translation: The best voice wake-up is extremely hard to achieve, but it will be a very good experience for users.
transcript: 你把唤醒做到极致是一个非常难的任务，而且如果把它做到极致是一个非常好的体验。

translation: There are a lot of collaboration cases.
transcript: 这里面很多合作案例啊。

translation: I will not talk about all of them.
transcript: 就不跟一一跟大家说了。

translation: Our platform has been established for quite a long time.
transcript: 我们额这个平台做的比较早，

translation: It currently bears heavy traffic.
transcript: 目前的话上面流量也比较大。

translation: Therefore, we have accumulated many partners and enjoyed good cooperation with them.
transcript: 所以积累了一系列的各种各样的这个合作的这个伙伴，跟我们现在都合作的那个还是蛮不错的。

translation: We mentioned that we are going to open some technologies at Baidu Create this year.
transcript: 所以这是我们额就是今年开发者大会上，我们说我们要开放的一些技术。

translation: We will fully open our technologies.
transcript: 额我们的开放还是很全面的。

translation: That is, we will not simply provide an online interface and ask you to use it directly.
transcript: 就是我们并不是说简简单单的一个线上给你一个接口，然后你直接去调用就可以了。

translation: Instead, we will fully open these technologies from terminals to the cloud.
transcript: 而是说我们是从端到云额全面的开放。

translation: You can use our SDK on your terminals.
transcript: 额从端上你们可以用我们的这个SDK。

translation: We will enable your terminals to have excellent voice recognition and barge-in capability to cut off the voices properly, and send them to our cloud for more accurate recognition.
transcript: 额我们会赋予你的这个端上面特别好的这个语音的识音的能力和这个语音的切断的能力，能够把这个语音切得特别准，然后发到我们云端的话，识别的话就可以更一步得准。

translation: We will also get other aforesaid voice technologies available for you.
transcript: 然后在语音上我们之前说到的一系列的这个能力，都会向大家去开放。

translation: In addition, we will open our new voice contents, including some regional dialects, Chinese and English speech.
transcript: 然后后面这个是我们额新开放，这个我们的包括我们的一些方言，然后中英文。

translation: Now, let's talk about our challenges and solutions for the voice technologies.
transcript: 那么后面我们可以再讲一下我们语音技术目前碰到的挑战和我们要做的一些事情。

translation: This is our newly launched voice recognition function for the call center.
transcript: 这个是额刚刚上线的这个呼叫中心的语音识别。

translation: We are also engaged in many projects for commercialization, and so we have optimized our model for the call center.
transcript: 因为我们也在内部也在做很多的商业商业化，所以我们针对呼叫中心专门对我们的模型做了优化。

translation: If you have related applications, you can use this technology.
transcript: 所以大家如果有专门针对这方面的额你们应用的话可以用到这方这方面的技术。

translation: Okay, let's watch a video clip, it's a demonstration of a long speech.
transcript: 好，下面看一个我们这个视频吧，我们长语音的一个演示。

translation: Please play it for us.
transcript: 工作人员给播放一下。

translation: Welcome to the AI Developer Conference.
transcript: 欢迎大家来到AI开发者大会。

translation: I'm very glad to demonstrate Baidu's voice technology.
transcript: 很高兴为大家做百度语音技术的演示。

translation: Our voice technology mainly consists of voice recognition, voice wake-up, and voice synthesis, etc.
transcript: 我们的语音技术主要包括：语音识别、语音唤醒、语音合成等技术。

translation: Long speech recognition is also outstanding.
transcript: 长语音识别的能力也比较突出。

translation: Like my speech now, it can be recognized in real time, and it works with whispering too.
transcript: 比如我现在说的话，就可以被同步识别，另外小声说话也能够被识别。

translation: Now I am in a meeting.
transcript: 我现在正在开会。

translation: I will call you later.
transcript: 开完会后给你电话。

translation: The sound of singing can also be recognized.
transcript: 甚至连歌声都可以被识别。

translation: Let's listen to a part of the song The Road to Ordinary.
transcript: 下面给大家唱一段《平凡之路》。

translation: I’ve crossed mountains and oceans, and wandered through crowds.
transcript: 我曾经跨过山和大海，也穿过人山人海。

translation: Everything I once had faded away in the blink of an eye.
transcript: 我曾经拥有着的一切，转眼都飘散如烟。

translation: I was once frustrated and disappointed, lost all direction, until I saw that the only answer lies in the road to ordinary.
transcript: 我曾经失落，失望，失掉所有方向，直到看见平凡才是唯一的答案。

translation: This handsome guy is our engineer, specializing in neural network language models.
transcript: 这个这个帅哥是我们专门做神经网络语言模型的工程师。

translation: You can take out your mobile phone, and use our Baidu App and Baidu's voice input method to have a try.
transcript: 所以大家可以试，因为你们手头就有手机，就能用那个手百，然后还有这个语音输入，百度的语音输入法，你们都可以试。

translation: These two approaches are exactly the same.
transcript: 额这两个完全都是一样。

translation: At the last Baidu World Congress, we also introduced the technology that displays texts converted from real-time speech.
transcript: 而且我们在最近的这个百度世界大会上，也上了我们的实时的语音上屏。

translation: Because of limited time, I won't demonstrate it today.
transcript: 因为这一次因为时间的关系，就没有在这个会议上去使用，好吧。

translation: Now, I’ll talk about some new scenarios and challenges that we have encountered.
transcript: 额下面跟大家说一下我碰到的这个新场景和挑战。

translation: These scenarios and challenges actually come from far-field voice and voice wake-up.
transcript: 新场景和挑战实际上在于远场和唤醒。

translation: As I mentioned before, the modeling capability and data accumulation for near-field voice recognition have reached a mature level.
transcript: 因为我们跟刚才跟大家说近场的这个语音识别的建模能力和这个额语这个数据的这个积累都已经达到了一个额比较好的比较成熟的状态。

translation: However, they are different for the far-field voice.
transcript: 但是一到了远场就不一样了。

translation: In far-field, what's crucial is the capability of voice recognition.
transcript: 到了远场，大家首先要比的是识音的能力。

translation: Far-field refers to the distance beyond one meter, three meters or five meters.
transcript: 远场我们的意思是说，在一米、三米和五米大概是这样的一个距离。

translation: Some people believe it's beyond six meters or eight meters.
transcript: 有的人说还是说还到六米啊、八米这样的一个距离。

translation: My microphone is in such a distance away from me, and I expect that you can recognize my voice when I speak.
transcript: 我的麦克风离得是这么远，然后我在说说话的时候，额也希望你能够比较好的识别。

translation: This is similar to our conversations in daily life.
transcript: 这个非常近似于额我们日常人跟人之间的对话是吧。

translation: When we talk with people face to face, we feel comfortable at a distance from one meter away.
transcript: 我们人跟人之间的话，基本上就要站到一米开外，我们说话才会比较自然。

translation: Therefore, the first challenge is actually our capability of voice recognition.
transcript: 所以这儿的话，实际上第一个挑战是对识音能力的挑战。

translation: Echoes come from a far distance, and far-field sounds bring echoes.
transcript: 因为你一旦距离离得远了，你就会带来回响，就这个声音它是有这个带有一定的回回声的。

translation: Moreover, noises can easily come from a far distance.
transcript: 另外的话，噪音可以特别容易地进来，因为你的这个空间远，所以你的这个噪音也会进来。

translation: So different noises and reverberations are mixed to weaken your capability of voice recognition.
transcript: 所以会有不同的噪音不同的这个混响，加在一起会对你的识音的能力，就变得非常的弱。

translation: In this case, we expect to have the capability to properly process signals of received sound waves.
transcript: 所以这个时候就需要对额来的进收进来的这个声波进行非常好的信号处理的能力。

translation: This is not just a problem of voice recognition modeling, but a problem of whether you have a great signal processing capability.
transcript: 这就不仅仅单单的是一个语音识别建模的一个问题了，而是一个看你信号处理的技术能力到底强还是不强的问题。

translation: And the hardware different from such a microphone is also involved and called microphone array.
transcript: 而且这里面又涉及到我们去用额跟这样麦克风不一样的硬件，就是叫这个麦克风阵列。

translation: It is a ring that can locate sounds, and can receive sound waves from a specific direction.
transcript: 它去它是一个环，然后呢可以进行声位的判断，可以定向的去去收这个声波。

translation: The quality of the received sound waves directly determines whether the recognition is accurate.
transcript: 所以这个收的这个声波的质量的好坏直接决定了识别得准确还是不准确。

translation: Due to this new challenge, the core voice technology has gradually changed.
transcript: 所以在这个新的挑战下，语音的这个核心技术又慢慢地在转移。

translation: It used to only involve recognition.
transcript: 它由一部分就是以前只是识别。

translation: But now it involves two parts.
transcript: 但是呢现在变成了两个部分。

translation: One is digital signal processing, and the other one is voice recognition.
transcript: 一部分是数字信号处理，另外一部分才是语音识别。

translation: If you fail to get these two parts perfect, you may fail to achieve good voice recognition.
transcript: 所以这两部分你如果都做的不强，那你的这个识别就还是不好。

translation: So it is a huge challenge for us.
transcript: 所以这儿是一个我们看到的非常大的一个挑战。

translation: Another challenge is wake-up.
transcript: 另外一个就是唤醒。

translation: The voice for wake-up comes from a natural state of our daily conversation.
transcript: 因为唤醒是我们平常对话的时候是非常自然的一个状态。

translation: For example, if I want to talk with you, I will first call your name to get your attention.
transcript: 譬如我要跟你说话，第一我要先说你的名字是吧，这样才能得到你的注意注意力。

translation: The wake-up function works in the same way.
transcript: 那么唤醒也是一样的。

translation: Our wake-up word is “Xiao Du”.
transcript: 我们的唤醒词就是小度小度。

translation: If you don't say "Xiao Du, Xiao Du", the speaker or remote controller will not respond to your voice.
transcript: 如果你不说小度小度，那么这个音箱或者一个一个什么遥控器什么的它就不会听你的声音。

translation: According to our experience, it is extremely difficult to make this function perfect.
transcript: 那么这个体验要做到极致，额被我们证明是一个非常非常难。

translation: You have to put a huge amount of time and efforts in it for success.
transcript: 也需要非常非常多时间投入才能够达到的一个水平。

translation: First, the wake-up function must be highly sensitive.
transcript: 就是第一你一定要唤醒要灵敏。

translation: If you call me and I respond in one or two seconds later, you may think that I'm stupid and not clever.
transcript: 因为如果唤醒以后我一到两秒以后才回答你，你会觉得我这个人可能比较笨，这个这个脑脑袋可能不太灵光。

translation: This is the same for devices.
transcript: 那么对于设备来讲也是一样。

translation: If you call the name of a device and the device replies you in two seconds later, you may think that this is a really stupid device.
transcript: 如果一台任何一台设备，你叫它的名字，它隔两秒才回答你，你觉得这个设备真的是太笨了。

translation: Another serious challenge is false wake-up.
transcript: 另外一个非常难的东西，就是误唤醒。

translation: That is, I do not call you, but you think that I'm talking to you and start to recognize my voice.
transcript: 就是我没有叫醒你，你突然之间认为我在跟你这这个对对话，开始这个进行语音识别。

translation: Then, a terrible experience comes from this incident, including chatting and playing songs in the middle of the night.
transcript: 然后呢又开始半夜的话，再说说话再播播歌，实际上对人的影响会特别的大。

translation: It is also difficult to solve the problem for false wake-up because of various coming-in sounds.
transcript: 误唤醒也是一个把它做到极致，也是一个非常难的问题，因为会有各种各样的声音进来。

translation: For example, if you turn on the television, you can hear various sounds from the TV program.
transcript: 譬如你在放电视的时候，会有各种各样电视的声音。

translation: When you are at home, you may hear the sounds from cooking in the kitchen and voices from people in the living room.
transcript: 你在家居的时候有这个炒菜的声音，有人说话的声音。

translation: We have this term called "rejection", which means to reject recognition.
transcript: 你都要把它做我们我们这个专业的额这个术语叫“拒识”。

translation: It is very difficult to achieve a higher accuracy rate for rejection.
transcript: 就是拒绝识别，把它做到非常准是非常难的。

translation: Now, we have achieved perfect functions for our best devices, but false wake-up still happens about every other day.
transcript: 我们现在额我们最好的设备，我们把把这个性能做到极致，我们能做到两天有一次误唤醒就是它还会有误唤醒。

translation: It is really difficult to overcome this challenge.
transcript: 因为这个这个这个这个技术要打磨到极致真的是很难。

translation: In a noisy environment, we can guarantee that wake-up occurs by mistake once in a two-day period, and it reaches the extreme level for the existing technologies.
transcript: 但是能做到两两天有一次误唤醒，就是后面有噪音一直在播，这个这个是目前技术能达到的极致。

translation: Last year, we did two things only.
transcript: 我们在最近的一年只做了这两件事情。

translation: One is for far-field recognition, and the other one is for wake-up.
transcript: 一个是远场识别，一个是唤醒。

translation: We have undertaken a great number of projects and made many technical innovations, and now we are satisfied with our technologies.
transcript: 我们经历了特别多，做了特别多的项目，额做了特别多的技术的创新，然后到今天基本上达到一个比较满意的状态。

translation: These are the challenges I said before.
transcript: 这就是我刚才说的额这个挑战。

translation: It is not easy to overcome them.
transcript: 非常的不容易。

translation: However, according to our experience, you can achieve a great user experience if you do a good job.
transcript: 但是也证明额如果你做得好，用户的体验会非常的棒。

translation: That is, if you call it by name, it will say "Master, what do you want to do?" or "Ok", or "Yes".
transcript: 就是你话音刚落，它马上就额会说额“主人，您想要做什么样的事情？”，或者说“好的”，或者说“我在呢”。

translation: That's really great as you have a considerate assistant to serve you at any time.
transcript: 那个感觉真的是非常的好，觉得你真的身边有一个很贴心的助助手，在时时刻刻地愿意为你去服务。

translation: What I have talked about may be not enough, because many technologies are involved.
transcript: 我不知道，可能不太够了啊，这个这块儿的这个技术的东西稍微多一些。

translation: So I'd like to tell more about these technologies.
transcript: 我跟大家再多说一点。

translation: One of the difficulties for voice wake-up is that you can't locate the sound source, because you do not know the direction of the coming sound.
transcript: 就是额唤醒之所以难，还难还难在你无法事先判断这个声音是来自于什么样的方方向，所以你无法把它进行声源定位。

translation: Therefore, you have to constantly collect sounds from all directions, and determine whether the collected sounds are the wake-up words.
transcript: 所以必须时时刻刻的在各个方向上去收收音，对收到的音进行判断，到底是不是诶我的唤醒唤醒词。

translation: After being waken up, you can determine the source of the sound and start recognizing voices from the specific direction.
transcript: 但当你唤醒了以后，你就可以定定向地判断这个声音的来源，然后定向地进行语音的识别。

translation: So, signal processing is one of the key technologies for the far-field voice recognition.
transcript: 所以在远在远场我们说这个信号信号处理技术是这个关键技术之一。

translation: Another technology named "Beamforming" is about locating phonemes, and it is also crucial.
transcript: 就还有这个我们叫Beamforming，就是我们这个这个音素这个定向的技术，也是非常的关键的技术。

translation: If you deviate even a little bit, your ability for collecting sound may get much worse at a distance from three or five meters away. As an old Chinese saying goes, "a miss is as good as a mile".
transcript: 你稍微偏那么一点儿，那么在三米或者五米开外，我们讲失之毫厘差之千里是吧，那么你收音的能力可能就会差很差很多。

translation: In the past year, we made many technological innovations on how to eliminate noises and echoes by means of digital signal processing, and how to how to perfectly locate the source of a sound.
transcript: 所以如果如何通过数字信号处理把这些额消除噪音的技术，消除回声的技术，然后声源定位的技术做到极致，这个我们在去年一年做了非常非常多的技术的创这个各种各样的创新。

translation: Let's watch another a video.
transcript: 以后再还有一个视频吧。

translation: Please play it.
transcript: 你给大家放放一下，工作人员给放一下。

translation: I'm three meters away.
transcript: 我在三米的位置。

translation: Xiaodu, Xiaodu.
transcript: 小度小度。

translation: I'm here.
transcript: 我在。

translation: How's the weather today in Beijing?
transcript: 北京今天的天气怎么样？

translation: I'm five meters away.
transcript: 我在五米的位置。

translation: Xiaodu, Xiaodu.
transcript: 小度小度。

translation: Hello!
transcript: 你好呀！

translation: What day is it today?
transcript: 今天星期几？

translation: Today is Saturday.
transcript: 今天是周六。

translation: I'm six meters away.
transcript: 我在六米的位置。

translation: Xiaodu, Xiaodu.
transcript: 小度小度。

translation: I'm here.
transcript: 我在。

translation: What day is National Day?
transcript: 国庆节是哪一天？

translation: October 1.
I'm eight meters away.
transcript: 我在八米的位置。

translation: Xiaodu, Xiaodu.
transcript: 小度小度。

translation: Hello!
transcript: 你好呀！

translation: What's the time now?
transcript: 现在几点啦？
当前十七点三十二分。

translation: I'm ten meters away.
transcript: 我在十米的位置。

translation: Xiaodu, Xiaodu.
transcript: 小度小度。

translation: I'm coming.
transcript: 我来了。

translation: Play the song.
transcript: 播放歌曲。

translation: "At Least I Have You" of Sandy Lam.
transcript: 《至少还有你》，来自林忆莲。

translation: We see that when the distances are six meters, eight meters and ten meters, our product manager has to shout.
transcript: 大家看到到了六米、八米到十米，就是我们的产品经理就得稍微喊那么一点儿。

translation: The farther you get away, the more difficult it will be for the machine to locate the sound.
transcript: 因为这个就是没你你离得越远对于它的这个非常精确的定位，各种的话挑战就会比较大。

translation: So it's really difficult to get this technology perfect.
transcript: 所以这个技术做得好，还是非常的不容易。

translation: However, we find a great user experience, because we keep a certain distance with people in the daily conversation.
transcript: 但是大家都看到了体验会很好，因为我们平时交流的时候就是隔着一定的距离。

translation: Right?
transcript: 对吧？

translation: In this way, you will feel that you are talking to a person instead of a device.
transcript: 这样的话你会感觉你是在跟一个人去说话，并不是在跟一个设备去说话。

translation: This is a brand new user experience.
transcript: 这是一种比较全新的这种用户的体验。

translation: "Listen to a quiet song for good sleep."
transcript: 听一首安静的曲子好睡觉。

translation: This is our data enhancement technology.
transcript: 这个是我们做的数据增强的技术。

translation: In order to achieve higher accuracy of far-field recognition, we create enough far-field data by adding the recorded impulse response function to the near-field data.
transcript: 就是我们为了把我们远场识别额做的足够得准，因为我们没有很多的远场这样的数据，但是我们可以把我们近场的数据加上我们的录制好的冲激响应函数，然后把它变成远场的数据。

translation: The clip just played shows the near-field voice added with the impulse response in the room.
transcript: 所以刚才放的那个是我们近场语音，然后呢加上我们房房间的这个冲击响。

translation: We can listen to it.
transcript: 大家可以听一听。

translation: "Listen to a quiet song for good sleep."
transcript: 听一首安静的曲子好睡觉。

translation: It sounds like a far-field voice.
transcript: 感觉就是一个远场的感觉了。

translation: Right?
transcript: 对吧？

translation: We have quickly converted the near-field data of tens of thousands of hours into far-field training data.
transcript: 所以我们把这个我们可以把我们额几万小时的近场数据额很快地转成我们几万小时远场的训练数据。

translation: In this way, we ensure that our accumulated near-field data can be used in our far-field model.
transcript: 这样的话可以保证我们远场的模模型也能够用到我们近场这个上积累的这个数数据。

translation: "Listen to a quiet song for good sleep."
transcript: 听一首安静的曲子好睡觉。

translation: It is slightly different from the real voice.
transcript: 看跟真实的声音基本上没有太大的区别。

translation: Another challenge comes from noise synthesis.
transcript: 另外一个是我们噪声的合成。

translation: Stringent requirements are proposed for the noises in a car, because the car is full of various noises, especially when you drive on an expressway.
transcript: 因为在车载里面对于噪声的话要求是非常的高，因为车载里面永远是有各种各样的噪声的，尤其你在开高速的时候。

translation: Regardless of an open or closed window or other situations, noises always exist, and so they need to be synthesized as well.
transcript: 你在开窗或者关窗各种各样不同情况下，噪声永远是有，所以噪声也得合成。

translation: Play a song of Jay Chou.
transcript: 播放周杰伦的歌。

translation: The environment is quiet.
transcript: 这是安静的。

translation: Now we add the noises arising from a car into it.
transcript: 然后呢我们把这个车载的噪声加进去。

translation: Play a song of Jay Chou.
transcript: 播放周杰伦的歌。

translation: Yes, like this.
transcript: 对，类似这样。

translation: We cooperate with manufacturers for the vehicular system, such as the rear-view mirrors and the front dashboard.
transcript: 我们在车车载上不论是我们的后装，还是我们的额后后装的这种后后这种车载的后视镜，还是我们前装的就是前面的那个仪表盘，我们都在跟各个厂家去合作。

translation: In the future, we will find a variety of vehicular voice appliances with Baidu's voice recognition technology on the market.
transcript: 大家以后会在很快地在市面上看到装着百度语音识别的额各种前装和后后装的这个车载的语音环境。

translation: Recently, we have released the updated Baidu Map, which is fully hands-free.
transcript: 另外我们的地图，我们地图最近刚刚发了一版新的，就是叫全面的Hands-Free。

translation: When using this Baidu Map, you don't need to hold it.
transcript: 就是你用百度地图，你只要放在那儿，就再也不用手啦。

translation: All operations are carried out by means of voice instructions.
transcript: 额所有的对于百度地图的操作，在车里面全部是通过语音的。

translation: This is our new technology.
transcript: 这个都是额我们带给大家的新的技术。

translation: This is what I talked about just now.
transcript: 这就是我刚才说的。

translation: In addition, errors can be corrected according to the voice prompt for our input method, which was made available online long ago.
transcript: 另外我们输入法的话也可以根据语音进行纠错，这个我们也已经很早就上上线了。

translation: For example, if there is a typo, you can say that “the Chinese character for ‘Bing’ in Fan Bingbing’s name is not the one indicating soldier in Chinese, but the one indicating ice".
transcript: 就是如果某一个字错了的话，你可以说那个就比如说额不是范冰冰的冰，额是那个当兵的兵。

translation: Then it will be changed to the right one.
transcript: 我们就可以把那一个字给改给改过来。

translation: At last, I'd like to tell you that as developers, we will make our best efforts to develop perfect technologies of any kind.
transcript: 所以最后的话还是想跟大家说，额我们做技术的一定会竭我们竭尽我们的所能，把我们的技术做到极致，不论是哪方面的技术。

translation: And we are willing to get our technologies available for you, and we expect that you can get more use out of them.
transcript: 而且呢我们愿意把我们这个技术开放出来额给大家去用，额希望大家能够好好地用，多多地用。

translation: We also appreciate your feedback, and will continue to make improvements.
transcript: 然后呢，多给我们反馈，哪些地方我们做的不好的，我们一定会再去继续打磨。

translation: Thank you all!
transcript: 谢谢大家！
